definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Rapunzel grew into the most beautiful child beneath the sun.
sentences.chinese: “萵苣”慢慢長成了天底下最漂亮的女孩。

sentences.english: We’ve all been taught that nothing is truly free, right?
sentences.chinese: 我們全都被教導過天底下沒有免費的午餐，對嗎？

sentences.english: Personally, I worry about something else—on behalf of job-seekers everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 就個人而言，我倒爲天底下的求職者們擔心別的事情。

sentences.english: A little more lightheartedness would render me the happiest being under the sun.
sentences.chinese: 哦，只要稍爲愉快一點，我就是天底下最幸福的人了。

sentences.english: Was losing my job the worst thing in the world?
sentences.chinese: 丟掉工作真是天底下最糟的事嗎？

sentences.english: Yellow Emperor is the best one who can spell out Tao.
sentences.chinese: 黃帝真是天底下，最能將道理說得精闢透徹的人了。

definition: I would like to ask (usually used rhetorically)/one might well ask
not fit to be seen by/should not be exposed to/can't bear to see
the second person/(fig.) someone else/third party
lit. heaven's law and earth's principle (idiom); fig. right and proper/right and unalterable/a matter of course
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1
